column5: Cloud computing is revolutionising the way that large, and often complex, datasets are stored and analysed.Our Cloud Computing MSc focuses on both theory and practice so that you can understand and implement cloud computing applications. You'll cover key subjects such as:advanced object-oriented programmingdata miningbig data analyticsYou'll develop both your technical and professional skills to underpin personal development and future career success. Our comprehensive research training provides a basis for PhD study.This is a demanding and rewarding course. We have close links to research by:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
